overview:
Belinda started Australian Baby Bargains (ABB) after having her first baby in 2010. Since then she has developed an online community of mums who use her free trading platform to buy & sell their preloved baby & kids gear around Australia. Additionally, she’s created a safe community for mums to come and share advice and support on the typical (and not so typical) challenges parenting brings. The ABB community now boasts over 47,000 members across their trading and social media platforms.

Quickly becoming of tired of countless fees on eBay when trying to sell her son’s preloved baby gear, Belinda turned to Facebook & created Adelaide Baby Bargains (ABB). It quickly revolutionised the way Adelaide parents bought & sold, soon developing into a part of everyday life for thousands of local parents. Fast forward 26 months and she’s just launched the Australian Baby Bargains website, rolling out into every capital city around Australia. The ABB community of over 47,000 parents (95% women 18-40 years) who use ABB as a part of everyday life, whilst saving thousands in the process, connecting with other like minded parents to create friendships, save money and share parenting tips & advice. Revenue’s generated through advertising, site sponsorship and various promotions from companies looking to promote their products and services within this highly sought after demographic.

Belinda previously spent 13 years as Director of Sales & Marketing to develop the multi-award winning ‘Unforgettable Houseboats’ at Mannum. Her family’s entrepreneurial vision revolutionised houseboating on the Murray River, and in doing so developed our multi-million dollar fleet of 10 luxury houseboats. She was solely responsible for multi-million dollar sales annually, boasting an industry leading 95% occupancy rate (double the industry average) and winning 16 State & National Tourism Awards for Unique Accommodation.

Belinda’s passion and enthusiasm for the role, together with her commitment to helping Australian parents save thousands of dollars using the Australian Baby Bargains trading platform, ensures ABB will remain as one of the leading parenting communities for mums across Australia!

milestones.description: Launched the Australian Baby Bargains website

video_embeds.description: Today Tonight - Adelaide Baby Bargains Website Launch
